attributes.action: Better rules for needing to be rehoused
attributes.additional_details:
I think more needs to be done to help people and potentially lower the suicide rates. I for one know how hard it has been having to move away from my family & friend connections and is has taken a massive toll
On my mental health and I know also a lot of others.  Signing back on to the housing list is one option but can and will take years. Mutual exchange is also another long stressful route to go down  when no one wants to swap with you.
attributes.background: Help more with people who need to be rehoused due to mental health problems and depression. Help people get back nearer to their family connections

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
